document_data.name: Thondar
document_data.mainbody: '''Thondar''' was an inhabitant of the city of [[Wheloon]] in [[Cormyr]] and a member of the [[Purple Dragons]].
document_data.History:
Thondar held the position of [[Roadcaptain]] in the Purple Dragons and led road patrols around Wheloon in the 1350s [[DR]].

During the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR|the Year of Shadows, 1358 DR]], Roadcaptain Thondar led a road patrol of fourteen Purple Dragons. They pursued [[Kelemvor Lyonsbane]], [[Midnight]], and [[Adon]] as they fled town on suspicion of murder, though they made a successful getaway.
document_data.Possessions: As a Purple Dragon, Thondar wore [[chain mail]]. Unlike the rest of his patrol, he fought with a [[battleaxe]] and also had a [[wand]] of ''[[magic missile]]''.
